sense.def:
To hop
pomeni premikati se s poskakovanjem na eni nogi.

seg.quote: ...hopping clumsily up and down in their chains.
They began jumping up and down together in short hops.

sense.def:
Kadar ptice ali nekatere majhne živali
hop
, se premikajo s kratkimi skoki z obema nogama naenkrat.

seg.quote: A hare hopped straight into the doorway.
...a bird so heavy that it could make only short, low hops through the brush.

sense.def:
To hop somewhere
pomeni hitro in nenadoma se nekam premakniti;

seg.quote: Let's hop in my car and drive out there.

sense.def:
Hops
so posušeni cvetovi; iz njih izdelujejo pivo.
